content: crochet this beautiful witching hour triangle scarf to complement any outfit and add a pop of colour to your wardrobe the witching hour scarf is designed for beginners and advanced crocheters alike who are looking for a quick and easy project to work up this triangle scarf is the perfect project to crochet while you watch your favourite show or listen to a podcast there is no counting or heavy brainwork involved depending on how quickly you crochet this scarf can be completed in a few hours making it the perfect item for craft markets or last minute holiday gifts medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design > **buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout ** * this scarf uses approximately 450 yds or a skein and a half of red heart boutique unforgettable yarn * it measures 51 wide x 17 5 in height but instructions are provided for adjusting the size of your scarf * a detailed photo tutorial for each stitch and technique is included in the pattern * i hope you enjoy making this scarf/shawl as much as i did > find the free version of the witching hour shawl here 1 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-the-witching-hour-triangle-scarf/
